thumbnail_url.description: URL for thumbnail of the image.

url.description:
URL for the image. Please assure your images are available with https. The minimum width is 280px, while the
minimum height is 170px.

width.description: Width in pixels of full size image

caption.description: Caption for the photo. Should be in the language indicated by the 'lang' parameter in the request.

height.description: Height in pixels of full size image
